campgrounds.name: Alice Lake Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: This campground offers stunning views of Alice Lake and a variety of recreational activities, including hiking, fishing, and swimming.

campgrounds.name: Golden Ears Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Situated in a beautiful forested area, Golden Ears Provincial Park offers camping, hiking trails, fishing, and swimming.

campgrounds.name: Joffre Lakes Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Joffre Lakes Provincial Park is known for its stunning turquoise lakes and breathtaking mountain views, offering camping and hiking opportunities.

campgrounds.name: Ruckle Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Ruckle Provincial Park is a scenic waterfront campground with picturesque views, hiking trails, and beach access.

campgrounds.name: Pacific Rim National Park Reserve
campgrounds.description: Located on Vancouver Island, Pacific Rim National Park Reserve offers stunning coastal scenery, camping, hiking, and surfing opportunities.

campgrounds.name: Kokanee Creek Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Kokanee Creek Provincial Park features a beautiful lakeshore campground and offers fishing, swimming, hiking, and wildlife viewing.

campgrounds.name: Miracle Beach Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Miracle Beach Provincial Park offers a sandy beach, scenic trails, and forested campsites along the Strait of Georgia.

campgrounds.name: Cypress Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Cypress Provincial Park is known for its skiing in the winter and offers camping, hiking, and mountain biking in the summer.

campgrounds.name: Manning Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Manning Provincial Park is a vast wilderness area with alpine meadows, lakes, and diverse wildlife, offering camping and hiking opportunities.

campgrounds.name: Herald Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Herald Provincial Park is a scenic campground located on the shores of Shuswap Lake, offering fishing, boating, and hiking.

campgrounds.name: Rathtrevor Beach Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Rathtrevor Beach Provincial Park is a popular seaside campground with sandy beaches, nature trails, and abundant wildlife.

campgrounds.name: Wells Gray Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Wells Gray Provincial Park is a vast wilderness area with waterfalls, lakes, and abundant wildlife, offering camping, hiking, and canoeing.

campgrounds.name: Kootenay National Park
campgrounds.description: Kootenay National Park offers breathtaking mountain scenery, camping, hiking trails, and natural hot springs.

campgrounds.name: Strathcona Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Strathcona Provincial Park is the oldest provincial park in British Columbia, featuring rugged mountains, glaciers, and pristine lakes, ideal for camping and hiking.

campgrounds.name: Juan de Fuca Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Juan de Fuca Provincial Park offers scenic coastal trails, beach camping, and opportunities for wildlife spotting and marine exploration.

campgrounds.name: Mount Robson Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Mount Robson Provincial Park is home to the highest peak in the Canadian Rockies, offering camping, hiking, and stunning views of glaciers and waterfalls.

campgrounds.name: Sasquatch Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Sasquatch Provincial Park is a picturesque lakeside campground with hiking trails, fishing, and opportunities for wildlife viewing.

campgrounds.name: Haynes Point Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Haynes Point Provincial Park is located on a scenic peninsula jutting into Osoyoos Lake, offering sandy beaches, camping, and birdwatching.

campgrounds.name: Mount Seymour Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Mount Seymour Provincial Park is a popular destination for hiking, skiing, and camping, known for its stunning mountain views and alpine meadows.

campgrounds.name: Skagit Valley Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Skagit Valley Provincial Park is a remote wilderness area with old-growth forests, pristine lakes, and rugged mountain peaks, offering camping and hiking opportunities.

campgrounds.name: Monte Creek Ranch Winery
campgrounds.description: Monte Creek Ranch Winery offers a unique camping experience amidst the vineyards, with wine tasting, farm tours, and beautiful views of the surrounding hills.

campgrounds.name: Kettle River Recreation Area
campgrounds.description: Kettle River Recreation Area features a riverside campground, sandy beaches, and opportunities for swimming, fishing, and kayaking.

campgrounds.name: Shuswap Lake Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Shuswap Lake Provincial Park offers lakeside camping, sandy beaches, and a range of water activities, including boating, fishing, and water skiing.

campgrounds.name: Gladstone Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Gladstone Provincial Park is a remote wilderness area with pristine lakes, alpine meadows, and rugged mountains, offering camping and hiking opportunities.

campgrounds.name: Bella Pacifica Campground
campgrounds.description: Bella Pacifica Campground is a beachfront campground with stunning ocean views, beach access, and opportunities for surfing and beachcombing.

campgrounds.name: Kalamalka Lake Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Kalamalka Lake Provincial Park features beautiful turquoise waters, sandy beaches, and hiking trails, perfect for camping, swimming, and wildlife viewing.

campgrounds.name: Hemlock Valley
campgrounds.description: Hemlock Valley is a mountain resort area that offers camping, skiing, snowboarding, and a range of outdoor activities throughout the year.

campgrounds.name: Mount Fernie Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Mount Fernie Provincial Park is a scenic mountain retreat with hiking trails, fishing opportunities, and stunning views of the surrounding peaks.

campgrounds.name: Durrance Lake Campground
campgrounds.description: Durrance Lake Campground is a small and peaceful campground near Victoria, offering camping, swimming, and fishing in a tranquil lake setting.

campgrounds.name: West Lake Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: West Lake Provincial Park offers lakeside camping, fishing, and hiking opportunities amidst beautiful coastal rainforest scenery.

campgrounds.name: Desolation Sound Marine Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Desolation Sound Marine Provincial Park is a popular boating and kayaking destination, with stunning fjords, islands, and secluded campsites.

campgrounds.name: Nairn Falls Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Nairn Falls Provincial Park features a picturesque waterfall, camping opportunities, and hiking trails through a lush forested landscape.

campgrounds.name: Bamberton Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Bamberton Provincial Park is a waterfront campground with views of Finlayson Arm, offering camping, hiking, and beachcombing.

campgrounds.name: MacMillan Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: MacMillan Provincial Park is home to Cathedral Grove, an old-growth forest with towering Douglas fir trees, offering camping and nature walks.

campgrounds.name: Witty's Lagoon Regional Park
campgrounds.description: Witty's Lagoon Regional Park is a coastal park with sandy beaches, tidal lagoons, and nature trails, perfect for picnicking and wildlife observation.

campgrounds.name: Stamp River Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Stamp River Provincial Park offers camping, fishing, and opportunities to observe salmon spawning during the fall season.

campgrounds.name: Kikomun Creek Provincial Park
campgrounds.description: Kikomun Creek Provincial Park is a lakeside campground with swimming beaches, boating, and fishing opportunities in the picturesque Kootenay region.
